short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switch Off from online distractions to increase productivity!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Switch Off add-on provides two options to increase productivity and reduce online distractions:
1. To unblock specified websites only at the configured time of the day, and
2. To allow opening only limited number of web browser tabs to avoid information overload.

We hope that Switch Off add-on helps you make very productive use of your time both at work and at home while browsing the internet.

Thank you and kind regards,

The Switch Off Team.

Feedback: switch.off@europe.com
